name: freckled
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
having small, pale brown spots on the skin, usually on the face: a freckled complexion He’s a red-haired, freckled 34-year-old. I'm really freckly. See
freckle
More examplesFewer examplesHis cheeky, freckled face appeared at the window.Three years ago, the wiry, freckled surfer rode a 66-foot-tall wave.She wore a sundress that shows off her lightly freckled arms.Freckly skin often goes with red hair.
